resources.string: Please wait for the scan to finish up!

Advanced PortChecker was created by DeadLine.

This application can be used to scan a host for open TCP ports. Please make sure that you have the appropriate permissions before scanning a host!

Images by: Google

Copyright Â© CodeDead 2018

Advanced PortChecker is an application that you can use to scan a host for open/closed TCP ports. Please make sure that you have permission to scan a host before initiating the scan!

A TCP port ranges from 1 to 65535.
The time-out is the time it takes before an active connection is closed. If your internet is slow and/or unresponsive, it is recommended to increase the time-out because your results might not be accurate.

If you happen to find a bug, you're welcome to send us an email!
The time it takes before a connection is marked as timed-out
Are you sure you want to reset all settings to their default values?
